mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RMS_RECIPE_BODY( ID RECIPE_ID PARA_CODE PARA_NAME SET_VALUE MIN_VALUE MAX_VALUE REMARKS CREATE_BY CREATE_DATE UPDATE_BY UPDATE_DATE UPDATE_CNT DEL_FLAG ) select sys_guid(), #{recipeIdNew}, RECIPE_ID PARA_CODE PARA_NAME SET_VALUE MIN_VALUE MAX_VALUE REMARKS CREATE_BY CREATE_DATE UPDATE_BY UPDATE_DATE UPDATE_CNT DEL_FLAG from RMS_RECIPE_BODY where recipe_id=#{recipeIdOld}
mapper.update: update rms_recipe_body a left join rms_recipe_body b on a.para_code = b.para_code set a.min_value = b.min_value where a.recipe_id = #{recipeIdNew} and b.recipe_id = #{recipeIdOld} and b.min_value != null

update rms_recipe_body a left join rms_recipe_body b on a.para_code = b.para_code set a.max_value = b.max_value where a.recipe_id = #{recipeIdNew} and b.recipe_id = #{recipeIdOld} and b.max_value != null
